system.description:
By expending a charge, the wielder of the wand or another creature within 60â€™ changes into another type of creature, as selected by the wielder. This works in the same way as the magic-user spells @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.FftOrHchNbQXBNEp]{polymorph self} and @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.WHtDX4vfhkXzPzlt]{polymorph others}.

  • Resisting: An unwilling subject may make a saving throw versus wands to negate the effect.
